name: Aventia
description:
Will your cunning combos and creative card choices crush the creatures before you?

Aventia is an upcoming game featuring card slinging combat with a rogue-like twist. Fast paced card combat meets strategic deck building and intriguing item choices. Approachable for newcomers with depth for veterans. Each run, you pick a class with access to over 40 unique cards and try to fight your way to the final boss. If you die, you start back at the beginning with the knowledge you have gained. Will you figure out the secrets of Aventia?

There are currently 3 playable classes in the game with 2 more coming soon:

Elementalist: The Elementalist has access to both powerful offensive and defensive spells and specializes in chaining together increasingly powerful cards

Agent: The Agent relies on tricks and cunning to defeat opponents utilizing poisons, daggers and reconnaissance

Occultist: The Occultist focuses on heavy single target damage and powerful debuffs. He can manipulate both himself and enemies and drain health from foes

Dev Note: This is our first public demo and we are looking for feedback. If you play the game It would be awesome if you filled out this feedback form, it really helps: Survey

If you enjoy the game, make sure to follow the game, give a rating and keep up to date with patches and announcements. You can follow us on Twitter and Instagram for more updates.
